General.Name: Primarindo Asia Infrastructure Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Primarindo Asia Infrastructure Tbk. engages in the production, marketing, and export of sports/casual shoes under the Tomkins brand name in Indonesia and internationally. It offers shoes for footwear, sports shoes, and leather and artificial leather industry. The company was formerly known as PT Bintang Kharisma Tbk and changed its name to PT Primarindo Asia Infrastructure Tbk. in 1997. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Primarindo Asia Infrastructure Tbk. is a subsidiary of PT. Golden Lestari.
General.Address: Gedung Dana Pensiun ? Bank Mandiri, Jakarta, Indonesia, 10230
